juzs.text: 51|31|Ibraahime ka’le, ‘he praeraita phiraistasakala! Tomalokara bisesa kama ki’
51|32|Te'omloke ka’le, ‘niscaya ami eta aparaadhi sampradayara prati praeraita haicho’.
51|33|Sihamtara oparata paka matira tukuraa niksepa karaibalai
51|34|yito tomara pratipalakara taraphara paraa cihnita simalanghanakaraisakalara babe.
51|35|Arau tata yisakala mumina achila ami sihamtaka uliya'i anicho.
51|36|Kintu ami tata eta paraiyalara bahirae ana kono muchalima poraa na'i.
51|37|Arau yisakale yantranadayaka sastika bhaya karae ami sihamtara babe tata eta nidarsana thai ahicho.
51|38|Arau muchara kahinito nidarsana ache, yetiya ami te'omka suspasta pramanasaha phira'a'unara ocarata pathiya'ichilo
51|39|kintu si ksamatara ahankarata mukha ghuraa'i la’le arau ka’le, ‘e'om ejana yadukara naha’le unmada’.
51|40|Phalata ami taka arau tara sain'ya bahinika sasti bihilo arau sihamtaka sagarata niksepa karailo arau si achila tiraskrta.
51|41|Arau nidarsana ache ada sampradayara ghatanato, (smarana karaa) yetiya ami sihamtara biraud'dhe akalyanakara bataha praerana karaichilo
51|42|se'i batahajaka ekorae eraa nachila, yara oparaedi gaichila taka curna-bicurna karai gaichila.
51|43|Arau nidarsana ache chamuda sampradayara ghatanato, yetiya sihamtaka koraa haichila, ‘eta nirdista samaya laike bhoga karai loraa’.
51|44|Kintu sihamte sihamtara pratipalakara adesa manibalai ahankara karaile; phalata sihamta ca'i thaka arasthate sihamtaka bajrapate dharaile.
51|45|Phalata sihamte thiya ha’balaike'o saksama naha’la arau pratiraodho karaiba noraaraile.
51|46|Arau (dhbansa karaichilo) iyara agata nuhara sampradayaka, niscaya sihamta achila phachikba sampradaya.
51|47|Arau ami amara ksamatara balata akasa nirmana karaicho arau niscaya ami mahasamprasaranakarai.
51|48|Arau ami prthiraikhanaka parai dicho, (coraacona, ami) kimana sundara byarasthapanakarai
51|49|arau ami pratito bastu yoraa yoraa srsti karaicho, yate tomaloke upadesa grahana karaa.
51|50|Eteke tomaloke allahara phale dharaita horaa, niscaya ma'i kerala te'omra taraphara paraa ejana spasta satarkakarai.
51|51|Arau tomaloke allahara lagata ana kono ilaha nirdharana nakaraiba; niscaya ma'i kerala te'omra taraphara paraa ejana spasta satarkakarai.
51|52|E'idarae sihamtara purbarartisakalara majata yetiya'i kono raachula ahiche, sihamte'i kaiche, ‘e'om ejana yadukara naha’le unmada’.
51|53|Sihamte ijane sijanaka e'i bisaye achiyata karaiche neki? Baram sihamta simalanghanakarai sampradaya.
51|54|Eteke tumi sihamtaka upeksa karaa, tomara kono dosa naha’ba.
51|55|Arau tumi upadesa di thaka, karana niscaya upadesa muminasakalara upakarata ahe.
51|56|Arau ma'i jina arau manuhaka kerala e'i babe'i srsti karaicho ye, sihamta kerala morae'i ibadata karaiba.
51|57|Ma'i sihamtara paraa kono jiraika nibicarao arau ma'i e'ito'o nibicarao ye, sihamte moka khuraaba.
51|58|Niscaya allahe'i jiraikadata, prabala saktidhara, paraakramasali.
51|59|Eteke yihamte an'yaya karaiche sihamtara babe ache sihamtara samamatalambisakalara darae praapya (sasti); gatike sihamte kharakheda karaiba nalage.
51|60|Eteke yihamte kupharai karaiche sihamtara babe se'idinara dhbansa, yi dinatora bisaye sihamtaka satarka karaa haiche.
52|1|Sapata tura parbatara
52|2|sapata kitabara yito lipibad'dha ache
52|3|unmukta patata.
52|4|Sapata abada grhara
52|5|sapata su'ucca cadara
52|6|sapata taranga-biksubdha uttala sagarara
52|7|niscaya tomara pratipalakara sasti arasyambharai
52|8|iyara pratiraodhakarai kono na'i.
52|9|Yidina prabalabharae akasakhana prakampita ha’ba
52|10|arau parbatasamuha drautagatita paraibhramana karaiba
52|11|eteke sarbanasa se'idina asbikarakaraisakalara babe
52|12|yihamte khela-dhemalira chalanarae asara karmata lipta thake.
52|13|Se'idina sihamtaka jahannamara ju'ira phale theli-heci lai yoraa ha’ba
52|14|‘e'itorae se'i jahannama yaka tomaloke asbikara karaichila’.
52|15|E'ito yadu neki? Ne tomaloke dekha noporaa
52|16|Tomaloke ju'ita praraesa karaa, tara pichata tomaloke dhairya dharana karaa ba nakaraa ubhaye'i tomalokara babe samana. Tomaloke yi karaichila tarae'i pratiphala tomalokaka diya haiche.
52|17|Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba jannatata arau praacuryara bhitarata
52|18|te'omlokara pratipalake te'omlokaka yi pradana karaiche seya te'omloke upabhoga karaiba arau te'omlokara pratipalake te'omlokaka raksa karaiba jbalanta agnira sastira paraa
52|19|‘tomaloke yi amala karaichila tara binimayata tomaloke trpti sahakarae khoraa arau pana karaa’.
52|20|Te'omloke sraenibad'dhabharae susajjita asanata a'uji bahiba; arau ami te'omlokara milana ghatama mrganayani danara caku bisista hurara lagata

52|21|arau yisakale imana aniche arau te'omlokara santana-santati'o imanata te'omlokara anugami haiche, ami te'omlokara lagata te'omlokara santana-santatika ekatraita karaima, arau te'omlokara karmaphala ami alapo hraasa nakaraima; pratyeka byaktiye'i nija krtakarmara babe dayi.
52|22|Arau ami te'omlokaka atiraikta pradana karaima phala-mula arau mansa yito te'omloke kamana karaiba.
52|23|Tata te'omloke parasparae panapatra adana-pradana karaiba, tata kono nirarthaka katha-bataraa nathakiba arau kono papa kama'o nathakiba.
52|24|Arau tata te'omlokara seraata carai'ophale ghurai thakiba kisorasakalara dala; sihamta dekhata yena suraksita mukuta.
52|25|Arau te'omloke ijane sijanara phale ca'i sudhiba
52|26|te'omloke ka’ba, ‘niscaya ami iti purbe amara paraiyala bargara majata sankita arasthata achilo’.
52|27|Tara pichata allahe amara prati anugraha karaiche arau amaka ju'ira sastira paraa raksa karaiche.
52|28|Niscaya ami agate'o te'omke'i ahbana karaichilo; niscaya te'om krpamaya, parama dayalu.
52|29|Eteke tumi upadesa di thaka, karana tomara pratipalakara anugrahata tumi ganako nahaya arau unmado nahaya.
52|30|Sihamte kaya neki ye, e'om (muham'mada) ejana kabi? Ami tara mrtyura pratiksa karaicho.
52|31|Koraa, ‘tomaloke apeksa karaa, mayo tomalokara lagata pratiksakaraisakalara antarbhukta ha’lo’.
52|32|Sihamtara bibeka-bud'dhiye sihamtaka e'i adesa diye neki? Ne sihamta simalanghanakarai sampradaya
52|33|ne sihamte kaya, ‘e'i kora'ana e'om nije'i racana karaiche’? Baram sihamta imana naniba.
52|34|Tente sihamte yadi satyabadi, tetiyaha’le sihamte iyara darae kono bani lai ahakacona
52|35|sihamte srastabihina srsti haiche neki, ne sihamta nije'i srasta
52|36|ne sihamte akasamandala arau prthirai srsti karaiche? Baram sihamte drrha bisbasa nakarae.
52|37|Tomara pratipalakara gopana bhandara sihamtara ocarate neki, ne sihamte'i sakalo bastura niyantranakarai
52|38|ne sihamtara ocarata mai ache, ya’ta araohana karai sihamte (urd'dhajagatara katha) sunibalai paya? Tente sihamte suna se'i spasta pramanato lai ahakacona
52|39|ne kan'ya santana te'omra babe; arau putra santana tomalokara babe
52|40|tumi sihamtara ocarata pratidana bicaraa neki ye, sihamte iyaka eta durbaha boja buli bhabe
52|41|ne sihamtara ocarata adrsyara jnana ache, yito sihamte likhe
52|42|ne sihamte kono sarayantra karaiba bicarae? Eteke yihamte kupharai karae sihamte'i ha’ba sarayantrara cikara.
52|43|Ne allahara bahirae sihamtara kono ilaha ache? Sihamte yi sbirka karae tara paraa allaha paraitra.
52|44|Arau akasara kono tukuraa bhani paraa dekhile'o sihamte ka’ba, ‘e'ito eta punjibhuta megha’.
52|45|Eteke sihamtaka erai diya se'idina paryanta, yidina sihamta bajraaghatata akraanta ha’ba.
52|46|Se'idina sihamtara sarayantra kono kamata nahiba arau sihamtaka sahaya'o karaa naha’ba.
52|47|Arau niscaya yihamte an'yaya karaiche sihamtara babe ache iyara bahirae'o arau sasti. Kintu sihamtara adhikansa'i e'i katha najane.

52|48|Arau tumi tomara pratipalakara sid'dhantara oparata dhairya dharana karaa; karana tumi amara cukura sanmukhate acha. Tumi tomara pratipalakara prasansara saite paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa yetiya tumi thiya horaa.
52|49|Arau te'omra paraitrata ghosana karaa nisara bhagata arau taraabora astamita horaara pichata.
53|1|Sapata naksatrara, yetiya i astamita haya
53|2|tomalokara sangi bibhraanta horaa na'i, arau bipathagami'o nahaya
53|3|arau te'om mane saja katha nakaya.
53|4|Eya kerala ahi, yito te'omra prati ahiraupe praerana karaa haya
53|5|te'omka siksa diche prabala saktidhara
53|6|saundaryapurna satta. Tara pichata te'om sthira haichila
53|7|arau te'om achila urd'dhadigantata
53|8|tara pichata te'om nikatararti ha’la, eteke nikatararti ahila
53|9|phalata te'omra majata dukhana dhenura duratba ra’la, athaba tatokai kama.
53|10|Tetiya allahe te'omra bandara prati yi ahi karaibalagiya seya ahi karaile.
53|11|Yi te'om dekhiche, te'omra antarae se'i samparke micha koraa na'i
53|12|te'om yi dekhiche, se'i samparke tomaloke te'omra lagata bitarka karaiba neki
53|13|arau niscaya te'om te'omka arau ebara dekhichila.
53|14|Chidaraatula munatahara ocarata
53|15|yara ocarata jannatula ma’oraa arasthita.
53|16|Yetiya chidaraa'i yi acchadita karaara seya acchadita karaichila
53|17|te'omra drsti bibhrama horaa na'i, arau sima'o atikrama karaa na'i.
53|18|Niscaya te'om nija pratipalakara mahana nidarsanaralira kichumana dekhichila
53|19|eteke tomaloke lata arau ujjha samparke ki koraa
53|20|arau trtiya ana eta manata samparke
53|21|eya ki katha, tomalokara babe putra arau arau allahara babe kan'ya santana
53|22|teneha’le eya eta asangata bantana.

53|23|E'ibora kichumana namara bahirae ana eko nahaya, yibora nama tomaloke arau tomalokara pitrpurausasakale raakhiche, yara samarthanata allahe kono dalila-pramana aratirna karaa na'i. Sihamte kerala anumana arau nijara prabrttirae'i anusarana karae, athaca sihamtara ocarata sihamtara pratipalakara taraphara paraa hidayata ahiche.
53|24|Manuhe yi bicarae se'itorae si paya ne
53|25|prakrtate akhiraata arau duniya allaharae'i.
53|26|Arau akasasamuhata asankhya phiraista ache, sihamtara madhyasthata kono kamata nahiba, kintu allahe yaka iccha karae arau yara prati te'om santusta haya tara babe anumati diyara pichata.
53|27|Niscaya yihamte akhiraataka bisbasa nakarae, sihamte'i phiraistasakalaka naraibacaka namerae namakarana karae
53|28|athaca e'i bisaye sihamtara kono jnane'i na'i. Sihamta kerala anumanara anusarana karae; arau niscaya anumana satyara mukabilata kono kamata nahe.
53|29|Eteke tumi se'i byaktika upeksa karaa, yiye amara smaranara paraa bimukha haya arau akala prthiraira jiranake'i kamana karae.
53|30|E'itorae sihamtara jnanara sesa sima. Niscaya tomara pratipalaka, teraemi ata'itakai bhala jane kona te'omra pathara paraa bicyuta haiche arau teraemi bhala jane kona hidayatapraapta haiche.

53|31|Arau akasamandalata yi ache arau prthiraita yi ache sakalo allaharae'i. Yate te'om sihamtara kamara pratiphala diba parae yihamte beya kama karae arau yate se'isakala lokaka uttama puraskara diba parae yisakale satkarma karae

53|32|yisakale sarau-suraa dosa-trautira bahirae danara danara papa arau aslila karyakalapara paraa birata thake. Niscaya tomara pratipalakara ksama aparaisima; te'om tomalokara bisaye samyaka aragata—(smarana karaa) yetiya te'om tomalokaka matira paraa srsti karaichila arau yetiya tomaloka matrgarbhata bhraunaraupe achila. Eteke tomaloke atmaprasansa nakaraiba, kone takbaraa aralambana karaiche se'i bisaye teraemi samyaka aragata.
53|33|Tumi se'i byaktika dekhichane, yiye mukha ghuraa'i laiche
53|34|arau kincita dana karaile arau bandha karai dile
53|35|tara ocarata kiba gayebara jnana ache neki, yito si pratyaksa karae
53|36|ne muchara chahiphata yi ache, se'i samparke taka arahita karaa horaa na'i
53|37|arau ibraahimara chahiphata, yijane purna karaichila (te'omra angikara)
53|38|seya haiche ye, kono boja bahanakaraiye anara boja bahana nakaraiba
53|39|arau e'i ye, manuhe se'itorae paya, yito si cesta karae
53|40|arau tara pracestara phala atisighrae'i dekhuraa ha’ba
53|41|tara pichata taka purna pratiphala pradana karaa ha’ba
53|42|arau niscaya tomara pratipalakara ocarate'i haiche sesa gantabya
53|43|arau niscaya teraemi hahuraaya arau teraemi kanduraaya
53|44|arau niscaya teraemi mrtyu pradana karae arau teraemi jirana dana diye
53|45|arau niscaya teraemi srsti karaiche yora-yorakai purausa arau narai
53|46|sukrabindura paraa, yetiya i skhalita haya
53|47|arau niscaya punaraut'thana ghatoraara dayitba'o te'omrae'i
53|48|arau niscaya teraemi abharamukta karae arau sampada pradana karae
53|49|arau niscaya teraemi asba-sbi’raa naksatrara pratipalaka.
53|50|Arau teraemi praacina ‘ada jatika dhbansa karaiche
53|51|arau chamuda jatiko (dhbansa karaiche). Sihamtara ejanako arasista rakha na'i.
53|52|Arau iyara purbe nuhara sampradayako (teraemi dhbansa karaiche). Niscaya sihamta achila atisaya yalima arau carama abadhya.
53|53|Arau teraemi olota'i diya abasabhumika niksepa karaichila
53|54|tara pichata se'ito acchanna karaichila yi acchanna karaibalagiya achila.
53|55|Eteke tumi tomara pratipalakara konato anugraha samparke sandeha posana karaiba
53|56|atitata satarkakaraisakalara darae'i e'i nabi'o ejana satarkakarai.
53|57|Kiyamata nikatararti.
53|58|Allahara bahirae kone'o iyaka prakasa karaibalai saksama nahaya.
53|59|Tomaloke e'i kathata bismaya bodha karaicha neki
53|60|arau hamhi-thatraa karaicha! Kanda na'i
53|61|arau tomaloke udasina
53|62|eteke tomaloke allahaka chajada karaa arau te'omra ibadata karaa.
54|1|Kiyamata nikatararti haiche arau candra bidirna haiche
54|2|arau sihamte kono nidarsana dekhile mukha ghuraa'i laya arau kaya, ‘eyato ciraacaraita yadu’.
54|3|Arau sihamte asbikara karae arau nija nija prabrttira anusarana karae, athaca pratito bisaye'i sesa laksyata upanita ha’ba.
54|4|Arau sihamtara ocarata sambadasamuha ahi pa'iche, ya’ta ache satarkabani
54|5|eta paraipurna hikamata, kintu bhitipradarsana sihamtara kono kamata aha na'i.
54|6|Eteke tumi sihamtaka upeksa karaa. (Smarana karaa) yidina ahbanakaraiye ahbana karaiba eta bhayaraha parainamara phale
54|7|apamanita aranamita nayanerae se'idina sihamte kabarara paraa ola'i ahiba, ene lagiba yena sihamta biksipta pharainahe
54|8|sihamte ahbanakaraira phale bhita-santrasta arasthata guci ahiba. Kaphirasakale ka’ba, ‘e'ito bara kathina dina’.
54|9|Ihamtara purbe nuhara sampradaye'o asbikara karaichila-- eteke sihamte amara bandaka asbikara karaichila arau kaichila, ‘e'om ejana baliya’, arau te'omka bhiti pradarsana karaa haichila.
54|10|Tetiya te'om nija pratipalakaka ahbana karai kaichila, ‘niscaya ma'i asahaya, eteke tumiye'i iyara pratisodha grahana karaa’.
54|11|Phalata ami dharaasara barasunasaha akasara duraarasamuha khuli dilo
54|12|arau matira paraa jharnasamuha utsaraita karailo; phalata gote'i pani milita ha’la eta paraikalpana anusarae.
54|13|Arau ami taka (nuhaka) katha arau peraeka nirmita nauyanata araohana karaalo.
54|14|Yito amara cakura sanmukhata calichila, e'ito puraskara tara babe yaka pratyakhyana karaa haichila.
54|15|Arau niscaya ami iyaka nidarsanaraupe raakhi dicho; eteke achene konoba upadesa grahanakarai
54|16|eteke mora sasti arau bhitipradarsana kene achila
54|17|arau niscaya ami kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho upadesa grahana karaara babe; eteke konoba upadesa grahanakarai achene
54|18|ada sampradaye'o asbikara karaichila, eteke mora sasti arau bhitipradarsana kene achila
54|19|Niscaya ami sihamtara oparata pathiya'ichilo pracanda sitala dhumuha nirabicchinna amangala dinata
54|20|se'i dhumuha'i manuhaka utkhata karaichila, yena sihamta ughali paraa khejura gachara kanda.
54|21|Eteke mora sasti arau bhitipradarsana kene achila
54|22|arau niscaya ami kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho upadesa grahana karaara babe; eteke konoba upadesa grahanakarai achene
54|23|chamuda sampradaye'o satarkakaraisakalaka asbikara karaichila.
54|24|Arau sihamte kaichila, ‘ami amara majarae'i ejana byaktira anusarana karaima neki? Eneha’le ami pathabhrastatata arau unmattatata patita hama.
54|25|Amara majara paraa e'omra prati upadesabani praerana karaa haiche neki? Nahaya, si ejana michaliya, dambhika’.
54|26|Ahakali niscaya sihamte gama paba, kona carama michaliya, dambhika.
54|27|Niscaya ami sihamtara babe paraiksasbaraupa uta patha'i acho, eteke tumi sihamtara bisaye apeksa karaa arau dhairyadharana karaa.
54|28|Arau sihamtaka jana'i diya ye, sihamtara majata pani bantana sunirdista. Pratyeke'i nijara pala mate panira ansata upasthita ha’ba.
54|29|Tara pichata sihamte sihamtara sangika mati anile arau si utajanika dharai hatya karaile.
54|30|Eteke mora sasti arau bhitipradarsana kene achila
54|31|niscaya ami sihamtara prati pathiya'ichilo eta pracanda sabda, phalata sihamta gohali saja sukana khandita kharaira darae hai ga’la.
54|32|Arau niscaya ami kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho upadesa grahana karaara babe; eteke konoba upadesa grahanakarai achene
54|33|luta sampradaye'o satarkakaraisakalaka asbikara karaichila.
54|34|Niscaya ami sihamtara oparata sila bahanakarai pracanda dhumuha pathiya'ichilo, kerala luta paraiyalara bahirae; te'omlokaka ami ud'dhara karaichilo raatira sesansata
54|35|amara phalara paraa anugrahasbaraupa. Yiye krtajnata prakasa karae, ami taka enekaiye pratidana di'om.
54|36|Arau niscaya lute sihamtaka amara kathina sastira paraa satarka karaichila, tathapi'o sihamte saradhana bani samparke sandeha posana karaichila.

54|37|Arau niscaya sihamte lutara paraa te'omra atithisakalara paraa asat uddesya dabi karaile, tetiya ami sihamtara drsti lopa karai dilo (arau ka’lo), mora sasti arau saradhana banira soraada loraa.
54|38|Arau niscaya puraa dokamukalite sihamtara oparata biraamahina sasti nami ahichila.
54|39|‘Eteke mora sasti arau saradhana banira parainama bhoga karaa’.
54|40|Arau niscaya ami kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho upadesa grahana karaara babe; eteke konoba upadesa grahanakarai achene
54|41|arau niscaya phira'a'una gosthira ocarato satarkakarai ahichila
54|42|sihamte amara sakalo nidarsanake asbikara karaile, eteke ami mahaparaakramasali arau sarbasaktimanaraupe sihamtaka dharailo.
54|43|Tomalokara majara kaphirasakala se'isakala kaphiratakai uttama neki? Ne tomalokara babe purbararti kitabata kono muktira ghosana ache
54|44|ne sihamte kaya, ‘ami sanghabad'dha aparaajaya dala’
